page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT IN DENTON
page.content: {Jobs}for many of the local residents are provided in the area of{west {Denton.}A large variety of firms and {businesses}have located on a purpose_built{industrial estate}on the outskirts of the town where ample open space for building and expansion is found. The two main{industries}are the manufacture of carpets, a remander of {Denton's}long connections with wool and textiles,and light engineering.The latter is found in many small firms, some only employing a small number of men. Other more specialist industries make use of local materials, for example the manufacture of bricks using local clay dug from an adjacent clay pit. Despite the industrial nature of part of this area the specture of unemployment has not left the workers untouched. A number of the small firms have closed.
